name: Joseph E. COLEMAN, Petitioner, v. Edmund S. PAWELEC, Charles L. Durham and James D. McCrudden, Acting Members of County Board of Elections of Philadelphia

judges: Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
parties: Joseph E. COLEMAN, Petitioner, v. Edmund S. PAWELEC, Charles L. Durham and James D. McCrudden, Acting Members of County Board of Elections of Philadelphia.
attorneys: Joseph E. Coleman, in pro per.
Ralph J. Teti, Chief Asst. City Sol., for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
458 A.2d 929
Joseph E. COLEMAN, Petitioner, v. Edmund S. PAWELEC, Charles L. Durham and James D. McCrudden, Acting Members of County Board of Elections of Philadelphia.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 18, 1983.
Decided April 20, 1983.
Joseph E. Coleman, in pro per.
Ralph J. Teti, Chief Asst. City Sol., for respondent.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
